member.name: T:Community.CsharpSqlite.Sqlite3.LockingStrategy
member.summary: Basic locking strategy for Console/Winform applications

member.name: T:Community.CsharpSqlite.Sqlite3.MediumTrustLockingStrategy
member.summary: Locking strategy for Medium Trust. It uses the same trick used in the native code for WIN_CE which doesn't support LockFileEx as well.
